content: if i am following fhir standards how it can be certified
who are going to check weather we are following FHIR standards or not

durga prasad said:

Hello Team,

@durga prasad FHIR doesn't enforce one single way of doing things. it provides a base framework for you to build upon on it for your healthcare setting. it provides tools and utilities to extend the functionalities. Anyway you will have to comply with FHIR spec / profiles, so your clients can integrate with you easily. It is not a question of acquiring the certification, most importantly the interoperability is what that matters. if you are going to implement the solution complying with FHIR standards, then the integration will be smooth for your clients. That's what is improving interoperability in healthcare. hope it makes sense. Thanks
Looking forward to it.. Keep up the good work. Thanks
